title: Tear Trough Filler
description: Targeted HA fillers and skin boosters soften hollow under-eyes, reduce dark circles, and restore rested radiance.
longDescription: Under-eye hollows can make you look tired even when you’re not. Our tear trough protocol uses ultra-light hyaluronic acid fillers and polynucleotide boosters to gently lift the trough, smooth fine lines, and improve circulation. We focus on subtlety, safety, and long-term support so your eyes look refreshed—not overfilled.

overview.title: Tailored to Your Under-Eye Anatomy
overview.content: We evaluate skin thickness, fat pad positioning, and vascularity before selecting the lightest HA fillers or PN boosters. Cannula delivery reduces bruising and allows us to blend seamlessly into the cheek contour. For stubborn pigmentation we combine filler with skin boosters or lasers for full-spectrum brightening.

faq.question: Will it cause puffiness?
faq.answer: We use low-density fillers designed for the under-eye, injected in tiny amounts to avoid puffiness.

faq.question: How long until I can wear makeup?
faq.answer: After 24 hours, once any tiny entry points have closed.
